00009 #include "strings.h"
00010 
00011 bool pushWarning(MavenCompiler* c, string message) {
00012         pushWarning(c, message, "", "");
00013         
00014         // pushWarning always returns true to make it easier to return an
00015         // error from another function
00016         return true;
00017 }
00018 
00019 bool pushWarning(MavenCompiler* c, string message, string arg) {
00020         pushWarning(c, message, arg, "");
00021         
00022         // pushWarning always returns true to make it easier to return an
00023         // error from another function
00024         return true;
00025 }
00026 
00027 bool pushWarning(MavenCompiler* c, string message, string arg1, string arg2) {
00028         MavenError error;
00029         error.line = c->lineNumber;
00030         error.file = combinePaths(c->currentDirectory, c->currentFile, false);
00031         error.message = message;
00032         error.arg1 = arg1;
00033         error.arg2 = arg2;
00034         error.level = MAVEN_WARNING;
00035         c->errors.push(error);
00036         
00037         // pushWarning always returns true to make it easier to return an
00038         // error from another function
00039         return true;
00040 }
